experience.title: Engineering Lead
experience.description: Directed engineering organization of 25+ engineers across 4 teams, delivering cloud-native platform serving 100M+ users globally. Established technical roadmap and architectural decisions for microservices infrastructure processing $500M+ annual transactions. Transformed engineering culture through implementation of DevOps practices, reducing deployment time by 90% and improving system reliability to 99.99% uptime. Orchestrated migration to Kubernetes-based architecture, cutting infrastructure costs by $2M annually while improving performance by 60%. Defined and championed engineering best practices including code reviews, testing standards, and documentation, improving team velocity by 45%. Built mentorship program developing 10 engineers into senior roles within 18 months.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected distributed systems handling 50M+ daily transactions with sub-100ms latency using Java, Spring Boot, and Apache Kafka. Led technical design for real-time analytics platform processing 20TB+ data daily, enabling business insights that generated $15M additional revenue. Spearheaded adoption of microservices architecture, breaking monolith into 30+ services with 99.9% uptime. Mentored 12 engineers on system design, scalability patterns, and performance optimization. Drove implementation of comprehensive monitoring and alerting system reducing MTTR by 75%.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed highly scalable REST APIs using Python and Flask serving 5M+ requests daily. Optimized database performance achieving 50% reduction in query latency through indexing and caching strategies. Implemented CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins and Docker, enabling 20+ deployments per week. Built automated testing framework increasing code coverage from 30% to 90%.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Built web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Contributed to open-source projects gaining 1000+ GitHub stars. Automated deployment processes reducing release time by 60%. Collaborated with senior engineers to deliver 15+ features on schedule.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
